body: I met my new partner last year and moved in with him about six weeks ago. I love and admire him deeply. He is dominant by nature, which at the beginning I liked very much, at least sexually. However, since moving in, his controlling ways have extended to forbidding me to wear certain clothes if they are too short or revealing, insisting I wear tights with dresses and so on. This makes me feel uneasy. I don’t want to be made into a dowdy, mousy partner who eventually gets replaced with someone more exciting. I have a tendency to become very insecure in relationships, and this is not the first time I have been dominated in this way.
